title: Brand value of Premier League ( England ) football teams 2019
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 6 lines denoting Manchester United, Chelsea, Manchester City, Arsenal, Liverpool, and Tottenham Hotspur. The y axis indicates the Value in million USD and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Manchester United, Chelsea, Manchester City, Arsenal, Liverpool, and Tottenham Hotspur are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Throughout the period, Manchester United generally had the highest Value in million USD relative to others with an average of 1193.89, and it reached its maximum at 2018 with a value of 1895.0.
Followed by Manchester City which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 753.1 Value in million USD,reaching its highest point  at 2019 with a value of 1407.0.
The botommost line, Tottenham Hotspur,  has a mean of 440.0, and peaked at 2019.
